parameters.subject: Callback Confirmation - {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.company.name }}
parameters.message:
=

Callback Confirmation

Dear {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.customer.name }},

Thank you for requesting a callback from {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.company.name }}!

Your Callback Details:

  • Name: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.customer.name }}
  • Phone: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.customer.phone }}
  • Reason: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.callback.reason || 'General inquiry' }}
  • Preferred Time: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.callback.preferredTime || 'As soon as possible' }}
  • Request Date: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

What happens next:

  1. Our team will review your callback request
  2. We'll call you at your preferred time: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.callback.preferredTime || 'As soon as possible' }}
  3. We'll discuss your specific needs: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.callback.reason || 'General inquiry' }}
  4. We'll answer any questions you may have

Contact Information:

üìû Phone: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.company.phone || 'Contact us for details' }}

üìß Email: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.company.ownerEmail }}

üåê Website: {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.company.website || 'Visit our website for more information' }}

If you need to reschedule or have questions:
Please call us at {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.company.phone || 'our main number' }} or reply to this email.

We look forward to speaking with you soon!

Best regards,
The {{ $('Gmail Callback Webhook').item.json.body.company.name }} Team

This confirmation was sent via our automated system. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us directly.
